properties.title: Musée du Léman
properties.abstract: Aquariums, boats, a fisherman's hut, works by Lake Geneva Region painters or scholars, as well as highly varied temporary exhibitions: the Musée du Léman is the only museum presenting the entire cultural and natural heritage of the Lake Geneva Region.
properties.description:
Since the year of its foundation in 1954, the Musée du Léman has built up a unique collection of natural and cultural objects and documents connected to Lake Geneva and water. Its navigation collection is particularly remarkable: over 30 preserved boats and more than 150 small-scale models.

The Musée du Léman also makes visitors aware of the present-day challenges: the fight against pollution, the preservation of freshwater fauna and flora and the water quality of the lake.
properties.name: Nyon Région Tourisme
